snippet.title: STRANGER OF SWORD CITY - Xbox One - Official Trailer 2 - Classic Style
snippet.description:
Xbox One – STRANGER OF SWORD CITY Official Site
http://drpg-sosc.com/

The second exclusive trailer for the Digital Download Title, STRANGER OF SWORD CITY on the Xbox One.

For our fans we have prepared two different trailers for the viewing pleasure of those who enjoy the Classic Artwork Style or the New Artwork Style.

This is the Classic Style trailer that showcases artwork by Yoko Tsukamoto and gameplay footage that highlights the following categories. Item Collection and Identification, Party Management, Useful Features and Regular vs. High Speed Combat.

General information on the Trial Version which will be released alongside the game at launch is at the end of the trailer so please stick around till the very end!

We hope you will enjoy the trailer!
